Gundam Golem?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS: Misc. Q&A (post all new topics here, we'll make more sections later): Gundam Golem?
By Ladydarkwolf on Friday, May 16, 2008 - 08:20 pm:

i was playing my game today and my Tiger whom i named Wolf was fighting with a gundam Golem. Anyone know the breed combo or how i can get him?

By GM on Saturday, May 17, 2008 - 12:16 am:

That's Gadgeter G, a special Golem. You have to regenerate it at the shrine.

Say, Thor, how do you regenerate this monster?

By Ruby Wish on Saturday, May 17, 2008 - 10:13 am:

Say MacKinrei (mckinley) in an asian accent, i believe

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, May 17, 2008 - 10:26 am:

The book only gives a word to say. The word is:

mahk-kin-ree (McKinley)

Several of the Golems are made by saying names of famous tall mountains from around the world. Catch is, you have to pronounce them as if you were speaking Japanese.

So, as non rares, there's eb-eh-esto (Everest), fu-ji (don't tell me you don't know this!), mah-tah-hon-no (Matterhorn), kira-man-jar-o (Kilimanjaro), mon-buran (Mont Blanc).

By Ladydarkwolf on Saturday, May 17, 2008 - 06:26 pm:

I got the Gadgeter G golem in my book for later thanks guys
